Class FileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • FileService
  • public class FileService
extends java.lang.Object
    The FileService class handles file reading and exception checking. It reads data from a file, performs validation, and stores the information into appropriate arrays.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int customerCount
      The count of customers read from the file.
      Customer[] customers
      An array to store orders.
      int operatorCount
      The count of operators read from the file.
      Operator[] operators
      An array to store operators.
      int orderCount
      The count of orders read from the file.
      Order[] orders
      An array to store customers.

    • Method Detail

      • fileReaderwithExceptionCheck

        public void fileReaderwithExceptionCheck()
        Reads data from a file and performs exception checking. The file should be formatted with semicolon-separated values. Each line should represent an order, operator, or customer. Throws exceptions for various error conditions encountered during file reading and validation.

      • matchOrders

        public void matchOrders()
        Matches orders with their respective customers.

      • checkStringlength

        public void checkStringlength​(java.lang.String[] datas)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks the length of each string in an array. Throws an exception if any string has a length less than 1.
        Parameters:
        datas - The array of strings to check.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If any string length is less than 1.

      • matchCustomers

        public void matchCustomers()
        Matches customers with their respective operators.

      • findandPrintOperator

        public void findandPrintOperator​(int id)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Finds and prints details of an operator or customer with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID to search for.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If no operator/customer is found with the specified ID.
